sourcesContent:
{{header}}

import { Component, Input, OnChanges, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ templateUrl: './testing.component.html', selector: 'test-component' }) export class TestingComponent implements OnInit { default = "Default Text"; header = "Hello, World"; update(value:string) { console.log(`update: ${value}`); this.header = value; } ngOnInit() { console.log("Init fired"); } }
